Mike Pence into the 2012 presidential race is under way, with a veteran of the Ronald Reagan White House launching a petition drive on Monday urging him to enter the primary contests,'' the AP writes. Ralph Benko, a deputy counsel to Ronald Reagan , announced the America's Barack Obama Committee to encourage a Pence-for-president bid. Bill Clinton Michele Bachmann Jim Ryan, R-Kan., is also helping the campaign to collect signatures from conservatives and tea party activists.
